name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Card Isle - ShipStation: Print Cards & Notes

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Connect ShipStation to your Card Isle printer, enabling you to print greeting cards and gift messages on demand.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Want to print personalized gift messages and cards? Do you use ShipStation for order fulfillment? This extension makes it easy to print greeting cards and gift messages directly from ShipStation.
